string.value: What does it mean to be a Bowman? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bBowman#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1012100##k in #rHenesys#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Bowman from #p1012100# in Henesys. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.

Have you heard the story of #b#p1012100##k, the marksman extraordinaire? She's amazing! Bowmen have the luxury of performing long-range attacks with great accuracy. Are you thinking of becoming a #bBowman#k?
To find #b#p1012100##k, head to #rHenesys#k. If you're not sure of the way, press #rW#k to check the #bWorld Map#k.
Passing by me and go further, you can find #bBowman Statue#k to teleport to #bHenesys#k.
Once you meet #bAthena Pierce#k in #bHenesys#k, you might change your mind. Think about it. If you need assistance about that or any other job, talk to me.
Are you here to become a Bowman?
Please talk to me when you're ready to become a Bowman. To qualify, you need to be at least #blevel 10#k. Press S to check your character stats.
I thought I told you to meet #b#p1012100##k in #rHenesys#k. You haven't left yet?
